monaco-hotlap.name: The Monaco Hotlap challenge
monaco-hotlap.description: Achieve a lap time of 1:11.000 at Monaco to win 1000 <:f1coin:834897400610029568>

monaco-hell-race.name: The Monaco Hell race
monaco-hell-race.description: Finish the race first, starting from P20 to win 1 000 000 <:f1coin:834897400610029568>. The race settings should be : maximum rain, simulation damage and no assists.
